list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an event, action, or process) come to an end; cease to happen.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his laughter stopped as quickly as it had begun
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tiếng cười của anh dừng lại nhanh như nó đã bắt đầu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cause (an action, process, or event) to come to an end.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: this harassment has got to be stopped
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sự quấy rối này đã được dừng lại

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: block or close up (a hole or leak).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he tried to stop the hole with the heel of his boot
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta đã cố gắng ngăn chặn lỗ với gót chân của anh ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a cessation of movement or operation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: all business came to a stop
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tất cả các doanh nghiệp dừng lại

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a set of organ pipes of a particular tone and range of pitch.
the effective diameter of a lens.
